text: @SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer DISCRIMINATION💔🦠😷🇺🇸🤦🏼‍♀️, ON THE TIME OF THE SILENT DEADLY CORONAVIRUS🦠😷💔. WE ARE ALL AMERICANS🇺🇸 EVEN THOUGH THEY/WE FELL IN LOVE😍 WITH A IMMIGRANT LIKE Mr. Trump AND SO MANY OTHER AMERICANS🇺🇸 DID💔.
